SELECT cm.*, (SELECT su.ACCOUNT FROM sec_user su WHERE su.deleted=0 AND su.channel_id=cm.id_ AND su.ACCOUNT_TYPE=2) account FROM channel_manage cm WHERE cm.deleted=0
AND cm.status=#{status}
AND cm.status !=2
AND cm.channel_name LIKE '%${channelName}%'
AND cm.linkman LIKE '%${linkman}%'
AND cm.channel_manager LIKE '%${channelManager}%'
AND cm.create_time >= #{joinStartTime} AND cm.create_time <= #{joinEndTime}
ORDER BY cm.create_time

SELECT b.* FROM(
SELECT cm.id_ id, cm.channel_name name, 0 parentId FROM channel_manage cm WHERE cm.deleted=0 AND cm.`status`=2 UNION ALL
SELECT su.ID_ id , su.USER_NAME name, cc.id_ parentId FROM channel_manage cc
LEFT JOIN sec_user su on cc.id_=su.channel_id WHERE su.DELETED=0 AND cc.deleted=0 AND cc.`status`=2 ) b WHERE 1=1
AND b.parentId=#{channel_id}

SELECT su.ID_, su.ACCOUNT,su.USER_NAME,su.MOBILE, (SELECT su1.USER_NAME FROM sec_user su1 WHERE su1.DELETED=0 AND su1.ID_=#{inviter_user}) inviter_user FROM sec_user su WHERE su.DELETED=0 AND su.inviter_user=#{inviter_user}
AND su.ACCOUNT LIKE '%${ACCOUNT}%'
AND su.USER_NAME LIKE '%${USER_NAME}%'
AND su.MOBILE LIKE '%${MOBILE}%'
AND su.inviter_user in( SELECT uu.ID_ FROM sec_user uu WHERE uu.DELETED=0 AND uu.USER_NAME LIKE '%${inviter_userName}%' )

SELECT su.ID_, su.ACCOUNT,su.USER_NAME,su.MOBILE, ( SELECT su1.USER_NAME FROM sec_user su1 WHERE su1.DELETED=0 AND su1.ID_ in (SELECT su2.ID_ FROM sec_user su2 WHERE su2.DELETED=0 AND su2.channel_id=#{channel_id} AND su.inviter_user=su2.ID_) ) inviter_user
FROM sec_user su WHERE su.DELETED=0 AND su.inviter_user
in (SELECT su.ID_ FROM sec_user su WHERE su.DELETED=0 AND su.channel_id=#{channel_id})
AND su.ACCOUNT LIKE '%${ACCOUNT}%'
AND su.USER_NAME LIKE '%${USER_NAME}%'
AND su.MOBILE LIKE '%${MOBILE}%'
AND su.inviter_user in( SELECT uu.ID_ FROM sec_user uu WHERE uu.DELETED=0 AND uu.USER_NAME LIKE '%${inviter_userName}%' )

SELECT su.ID_, su.ACCOUNT,su.USER_NAME,su.MOBILE, (SELECT su1.USER_NAME FROM sec_user su1 WHERE su1.DELETED=0 AND su1.ID_=su.inviter_user) inviter_user FROM sec_user su WHERE su.DELETED=0 AND su.ACCOUNT_TYPE='1'
AND su.ACCOUNT LIKE '%${ACCOUNT}%'
AND su.USER_NAME LIKE '%${USER_NAME}%'
AND su.MOBILE LIKE '%${MOBILE}%'
AND su.inviter_user in( SELECT uu.ID_ FROM sec_user uu WHERE uu.DELETED=0 AND uu.USER_NAME LIKE '%${inviter_userName}%' )
